set.name: DM23-BD3 Game Designers Selection Deck: Water Darkness Nature Hand Destruction

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Trinity Command/S-Rank Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your water, darkness or nature creatures. ■ SSS-Rank Invasion "Disaster": Water, Darkness or Nature Command (When one of your Water, Darkness or Nature Commands attack, you may put this card from the battle zone, your hand, graveyard or mana zone onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature onto another creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's graveyard or mana zone or return it to their hand.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD3 Game Designers Selection Deck: Water Darkness Nature Hand Destruction

property.name: Type
property.value: Star Max Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Oni RexStars

property.name: Rules
property.value: ONI STAR MAX EVOLUTION When you would lose the game or this creature would leave, you may destroy 3 of your face up cards instead. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest to your hand.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each player chooses 3 of their shields and puts the rest into their graveyard. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroy them. Then your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: King Master Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD3 Game Designers Selection Deck: Water Darkness Nature Hand Destruction

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may cast this spell from your graveyard, If you do, after you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard.. ■Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it: ► Put a darkness creature that costs 4 or less or a darkness aura that costs 4 or less from your graveyard: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD3 Game Designers Selection Deck: Water Darkness Nature Hand Destruction

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Gravity Zero: If you have 7 or more Jokers in your mana zone and/or battle zone, you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Choose a card that costs 3 or less and put it on the bottom of it’s owner’s deck. ► One of your creatures can attack your opponent until the end of the turn. ► Choose one of your opponent’s creatures. Ignore that creature’s effects until the end of the turn.

property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Sonic Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may cast a spell that costs 4 or less from your graveyard for no cost. After you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard. ■ Whenever you cast a spell, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD3 Game Designers Selection Deck: Water Darkness Nature Hand Destruction

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, put up to 2 creatures that cost 3 or less. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD3 Game Designers Selection Deck: Water Darkness Nature Hand Destruction

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STRIKE BACK}-Darkness (When a Darkness card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it. {SEAL} (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck on top of that card face down. Whenever a Command is put, its owner puts a seal from one of their cards that has the same civilization as that Command into their graveyard. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ Whenever your opponent would look at or reveal one or more cards from their deck, your opponent reveals the top card of their deck instead.
